link_desc:
Template for basic ASSP (Anti Spam SMTP Proxy) Health monitoring. Tested with ASSP v 2.6.2

The ASSP configuration item allowStatConnectionsFrom must be modified to allow querying Raw Statistics from your Zabbix server's IP address.

This template uses Zabbix Web scenarios to query the ASSP Raw Statistics service via http on port 55553.

Triggers will raise an alert under the following conditions:

#) Zabbix cannot connect to the ASSP Raw Statistics service.
#) ASSP reports the "Current healthy status" as something other than "healthy".
#) The Zabbix Web scenarios service logs an error.
author: Peter Hinman
